newsitem.title: CANADA: Bank of Canada to auction C$1.6 bln 21-day T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Canada to auction C$1.6 bln 21-day T-bills.

text.p: The Bank of Canada plans to auction C$1.6 billion of 21-day treasury bills on Wednesday August 21, the central bank said on Tuesday.
The auction will be held at 1100 EDT/1500 GMT with results announced at 1130 EDT/1530 GMT. The bills will be dated and delivered on August 22 and will mature on September 12, the Bank of Canada said.
The tender is subject to standard auction terms.
